title: 6 things you can do with JBang but you canâ€™t with Shell
content: Using Java as scripting language has become a popular option in the last few years thanks to the JShell tool. In this article we will learn how the JBang scripting tool can take your Java scripting power at another level. Automatic fetching of dependencies The most impressing feature of JBang is dependency management. You can ...  The post appeared first on .
